results.name: list
results.description: List Azure advisor recommendations in a subscription.

option.name: --tenant
option.description: The Microsoft Entra ID tenant ID or name. This can be either the GUID identifier or the display name of your Entra ID tenant.

option.name: --auth-method
option.description: Authentication method to use. Options: 'credential' (Azure CLI/managed identity), 'key' (access key), or 'connectionString'.

option.name: --retry-delay
option.description: Initial delay in seconds between retry attempts. For exponential backoff, this value is used as the base.

option.name: --retry-max-delay
option.description: Maximum delay in seconds between retries, regardless of the retry strategy.

option.name: --retry-max-retries
option.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations before giving up.

option.name: --retry-mode
option.description: Retry strategy to use. 'fixed' uses consistent delays, 'exponential' increases delay between attempts.

option.name: --retry-network-timeout
option.description: Network operation timeout in seconds. Operations taking longer than this will be cancelled.

option.name: --subscription
option.description: Specifies the Azure subscription to use. Accepts either a subscription ID (GUID) or display name. If not specified, the AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID environment variable will be used instead.

option.name: --resource-group
option.description: The name of the Azure resource group. This is a logical container for Azure resources.

destructive.description: This tool performs only additive updates without deleting or modifying existing resources.

idempotent.description: Running this operation multiple times with the same arguments produces the same result without additional effects.

openWorld.description: This tool's domain of interaction is closed and well-defined, limited to a specific set of entities (like memory access).

readOnly.description: This tool only performs read operations without modifying any state or data.

secret.description: This tool does not handle sensitive or secret information.

localRequired.description: This tool is available in both local and remote server modes.
